siteMetadata.title: Soukaina Mehdi - Digital Marketing Consultant
siteMetadata.description: Data-driven digital marketing strategies for business growth. Expert consulting in Morocco & Turkey.  Schedule a free consultation!
siteMetadata.keywords: digital marketing, marketing consultant, business growth, seo, social media, email marketing, Morocco, Turkey
siteMetadata.author: Soukaina Mehdi

myJourneySection.title: My Journey
myJourneySection.description: I believe in the power of data to drive informed decision-making and fuel business growth. My approach is centered around understanding your unique challenges and goals, then leveraging my expertise to develop tailored strategies that address your specific needs. From optimizing your marketing funnel to refining your brand messaging, I’m here to guide you every step of the way.

column1.text: My Business operates in Morocco and Turkey

heroSection.title: Digital Marketing & Business Growth Consultant
heroSection.description: I design **result-driven marketing strategies** that turn traffic into revenue,drive more leads & sales, and **maximize ROI** with Performance optimization.

aboutSection.title: About Soukaina Mehdi
aboutSection.description: Experienced IT professional turned marketing expert. I'm passionate about using data to solve business challenges and fuel growth for clients in Morocco and Turkey.
qualifications: Experience in Morocco and Turkey markets
Expertise in marketing strategy, data analysis, and team leadership.
aboutSection.keywords: marketing consultant, Morocco, Turkey, IT, data analysis

approachSection.title: My Data-First Approach
approachSection.description: I believe in data-driven decisions for sustainable growth. From funnel optimization to brand awareness, I craft personalized strategies that address your unique needs.
approachSection.keywords: data-driven, marketing funnel, brand awareness, personalized strategy

servicesSection.title: Services
servicesSection.description: I provide a comprehensive range of digital marketing services to elevate your brand and drive growth. Learn more about how I can help your business thrive:

services.title: Marketing Strategy Development
services.description: Crafting data-backed strategies to achieve your business goals and reach your target audience.

services.title: Growth Marketing
services.description: Implementing data-driven strategies to boost growth and maximize your return on investment (ROI).

services.title: Email Marketing
services.description: Personalized campaigns to engage your audience and nurture leads with email marketing.
services.keywords: email campaigns, lead nurturing, personalized email

services.title: Online Advertising
services.description: Targeted campaigns across diverse platforms to connect with your ideal customers.
services.keywords: paid advertising, ppc, google ads, social media ads

services.title: Marketing Consulting & Advisory
services.description: Expert guidance to overcome challenges and unlock new opportunities.

services.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
services.description: Content and website optimization to improve your search ranking and drive organic traffic.

services.title: Market Research and Analysis
services.description: Understanding customer behavior and industry trends to inform your marketing decisions.
services.keywords: market analysis, competitive analysis, target market

services.title: Performance Measurement
services.description: Tracking and analyzing marketing data to optimize ROI and make data-driven decisions.
services.keywords: marketing analytics, key performance indicators, data

services.title: Training and Workshops
services.description: Customized workshops to educate your team on best practices and industry trends.

services.title: Lead Generation & Conversion Optimization
services.description: Targeted tactics and CRO techniques to attract and convert leads into customers.
services.keywords: lead generation, conversion rate optimization, cro

services.title: Social Media Marketing
services.description: Engaging strategies to build brand awareness and drive traffic on social platforms.

services.title: Mobile App Marketing
services.description: Effective app promotion through ASO, mobile advertising, and install campaigns.
services.keywords: mobile app marketing, aso, app installs
